00070 /* file data for open files on MDS */
00071 struct mdt_file_data {
00073         struct portals_handle   mfd_handle;
00075         __u64                   mfd_mode;
00077         struct list_head        mfd_list;
00079         __u64                   mfd_xid;
00081         struct lustre_handle    mfd_old_handle;
00083         struct mdt_object       *mfd_object;
00084 };
00085 
00086 #define CDT_NONBLOCKING_RESTORE         (1ULL << 0)
00087 #define CDT_NORETRY_ACTION              (1ULL << 1)
00088 #define CDT_POLICY_LAST                 CDT_NORETRY_ACTION
00089 #define CDT_POLICY_SHIFT_COUNT          2
00090 #define CDT_POLICY_ALL                  (CDT_NONBLOCKING_RESTORE | \
00091                                         CDT_NORETRY_ACTION)
00092 
00093 /* when adding a new policy, do not forget to update
00094  * lustre/mdt/mdt_coordinator.c::hsm_policy_names[]
00095  */
00096 #define CDT_DEFAULT_POLICY              CDT_NORETRY_ACTION
00097 
00098 enum cdt_states { CDT_STOPPED = 0,
00099                   CDT_INIT,
00100                   CDT_RUNNING,
00101                   CDT_DISABLE,
00102                   CDT_STOPPING };
00103 
00104 /* when multiple lock are needed, the lock order is
00105  * cdt_llog_lock
00106  * cdt_agent_lock
00107  * cdt_counter_lock
00108  * cdt_restore_lock
00109  * cdt_request_lock
00110  */
00111 struct coordinator {
00112         struct ptlrpc_thread     cdt_thread;         
00113         struct lu_env            cdt_env;            
00115         struct lu_context        cdt_session;        
00116         struct proc_dir_entry   *cdt_proc_dir;       
00117         __u64                    cdt_policy;         
00118         enum cdt_states          cdt_state;           
00119         atomic_t                 cdt_compound_id;     
00121         __u64                    cdt_last_cookie;     
00123         struct mutex             cdt_llog_lock;       
00125         struct rw_semaphore      cdt_agent_lock;      
00126         struct rw_semaphore      cdt_request_lock;    
00128         struct mutex             cdt_restore_lock;    
00130         cfs_time_t               cdt_loop_period;     
00131         cfs_time_t               cdt_grace_delay;     
00133         cfs_time_t               cdt_active_req_timeout; 
00134         __u32                    cdt_default_archive_id; 
00137         __u64                    cdt_max_requests;    
00139         atomic_t                 cdt_request_count;   
00141         struct list_head         cdt_requests;        
00143         struct list_head         cdt_agents;          
00145         struct list_head         cdt_restore_hdl;     
00147         /* Bitmasks indexed by the HSMA_XXX constants. */
00148         __u64                    cdt_user_request_mask;
00149         __u64                    cdt_group_request_mask;
00150         __u64                    cdt_other_request_mask;
00151 };
00152 
00153 /* mdt state flag bits */
00154 #define MDT_FL_CFGLOG 0
00155 #define MDT_FL_SYNCED 1
00156 
00157 struct mdt_device {
00158         /* super-class */
00159         struct lu_device           mdt_lu_dev;
00160         struct seq_server_site     mdt_seq_site;
00161         /* DLM name-space for meta-data locks maintained by this server */
00162         struct ldlm_namespace     *mdt_namespace;
00163         /* ptlrpc handle for MDS->client connections (for lock ASTs). */
00164         struct ptlrpc_client      *mdt_ldlm_client;
00165         /* underlying device */
00166         struct obd_export         *mdt_child_exp;
00167         struct md_device          *mdt_child;
00168         struct dt_device          *mdt_bottom;
00169         struct obd_export         *mdt_bottom_exp;
00171         struct lu_target           mdt_lut;
00172         /*
00173          * Options bit-fields.
00174          */
00175         struct {
00176                 unsigned int       mo_user_xattr:1,
00177                                    mo_acl:1,
00178                                    mo_cos:1,
00179                                    mo_evict_tgt_nids:1,
00180                                    mo_coordinator:1;
00181         } mdt_opts;
00182         /* mdt state flags */
00183         unsigned long              mdt_state;
00184 
00185         /* transaction callbacks */
00186         struct dt_txn_callback     mdt_txn_cb;
00187 
00188         /* these values should be updated from lov if necessary.
00189          * or should be placed somewhere else. */
00190         int                        mdt_max_mdsize;
00191 
00192         int                        mdt_max_ea_size;
00193 
00194         struct upcall_cache        *mdt_identity_cache;
00195 
00196         unsigned int               mdt_capa_conf:1,
00197                                    /* Enable remote dir on non-MDT0 */
00198                                    mdt_enable_remote_dir:1,
00199                                    mdt_skip_lfsck:1;
00200 
00201         gid_t                      mdt_enable_remote_dir_gid;
00202         /* statfs optimization: we cache a bit  */
00203         struct obd_statfs          mdt_osfs;
00204         __u64                      mdt_osfs_age;
00205         spinlock_t                 mdt_osfs_lock;
00206 
00207         /* root squash */
00208         struct root_squash_info    mdt_squash;
00209 
00210         struct rename_stats        mdt_rename_stats;
00211         struct lu_fid              mdt_md_root_fid;
00212 
00213         /* connection to quota master */
00214         struct obd_export         *mdt_qmt_exp;
00215         /* quota master device associated with this MDT */
00216         struct lu_device          *mdt_qmt_dev;
00217 
00218         struct coordinator         mdt_coordinator;
00219 
00220         /* inter-MDT connection count */
00221         atomic_t                   mdt_mds_mds_conns;
00222 
00223         /* MDT device async commit count, used for debug and sanity test */
00224         atomic_t                   mdt_async_commit_count;
00225 };

00227 #define MDT_SERVICE_WATCHDOG_FACTOR     (2)
00228 #define MDT_COS_DEFAULT         (0)

00230 enum mdt_object_flags {
00232         MOF_LOV_CREATED         = 1 << 0,
00233 };
00234 
00235 struct mdt_object {
00236         struct lu_object_header mot_header;
00237         struct lu_object        mot_obj;
00238         enum mdt_object_flags   mot_flags;
00239         int                     mot_write_count;
00240         spinlock_t              mot_write_lock;
00241         /* Lock to protect create_data */
00242         struct mutex            mot_lov_mutex;
00243         /* Lock to protect lease open.
00244          * Lease open acquires write lock; normal open acquires read lock */
00245         struct rw_semaphore     mot_open_sem;
00246         atomic_t                mot_lease_count;
00247         atomic_t                mot_open_count;
00248 };
00249 
00250 struct mdt_lock_handle {
00251         /* Lock type, reg for cross-ref use or pdo lock. */
00252         mdl_type_t              mlh_type;
00253 
00254         /* Regular lock */
00255         struct lustre_handle    mlh_reg_lh;
00256         enum ldlm_mode          mlh_reg_mode;
00257 
00258         /* Pdirops lock */
00259         struct lustre_handle    mlh_pdo_lh;
00260         enum ldlm_mode          mlh_pdo_mode;
00261         unsigned int            mlh_pdo_hash;
00262 
00263         /* Remote regular lock */
00264         struct lustre_handle    mlh_rreg_lh;
00265         enum ldlm_mode          mlh_rreg_mode;
00266 };
00267 
00268 enum {
00269         MDT_LH_PARENT,  /* parent lockh */
00270         MDT_LH_CHILD,   /* child lockh */
00271         MDT_LH_OLD,     /* old lockh for rename */
00272         MDT_LH_LAYOUT = MDT_LH_OLD, /* layout lock */
00273         MDT_LH_NEW,     /* new lockh for rename */
00274         MDT_LH_RMT,     /* used for return lh to caller */
00275         MDT_LH_LOCAL,   /* local lock never return to client */
00276         MDT_LH_NR
00277 };
00278 
00279 enum {
00280         MDT_LOCAL_LOCK,
00281         MDT_CROSS_LOCK
00282 };
00283 
00284 /* Special magical errno for communicaiton between mdt_reint_open()
00285  * and mdt_intent_reint() which means return the lock to the client
00286  * for subsequent cross ref open. Previously we used plain -EREMOTE
00287  * but other functions called in that path might return it too and
00288  * confuse us. This is not returned to the client. See LU-5370. */
00289 #define MDT_EREMOTE_OPEN (EREMOTE + 1024)
00290 
00291 struct mdt_reint_record {
00292         mdt_reint_t                      rr_opcode;
00293         const struct lustre_handle      *rr_handle;
00294         const struct lu_fid             *rr_fid1;
00295         const struct lu_fid             *rr_fid2;
00296         struct lu_name                   rr_name;
00297         struct lu_name                   rr_tgt_name;
00298         void                            *rr_eadata;
00299         int                              rr_eadatalen;
00300         __u32                            rr_flags;
00301 };
00302 
00303 enum mdt_reint_flag {
00304         MRF_OPEN_TRUNC = 1 << 0,
00305 };
00306 
00307 /*
00308  * Common data shared by mdt-level handlers. This is allocated per-thread to
00309  * reduce stack consumption.
00310  */
00311 struct mdt_thread_info {
00312         /*
00313          * XXX: Part One:
00314          * The following members will be filled explicitly
00315          * with specific data in mdt_thread_info_init().
00316          */
00317         /* TODO: move this into mdt_session_key(with LCT_SESSION), because
00318          * request handling may migrate from one server thread to another.
00319          */
00320         struct req_capsule        *mti_pill;
00321 
00322         /* although we have export in req, there are cases when it is not
00323          * available, e.g. closing files upon export destroy */
00324         struct obd_export          *mti_exp;
00325         /*
00326          * A couple of lock handles.
00327          */
00328         struct mdt_lock_handle     mti_lh[MDT_LH_NR];
00329 
00330         struct mdt_device         *mti_mdt;
00331         const struct lu_env       *mti_env;
00332 
00333         /* transaction number of current request */
00334         __u64                      mti_transno;
00335 
00336 
00337         /*
00338          * XXX: Part Two:
00339          * The following members will be filled expilictly
00340          * with zero in mdt_thread_info_init(). These members may be used
00341          * by all requests.
00342          */
00343 
00344         /*
00345          * Object attributes.
00346          */
00347         struct md_attr             mti_attr;
00348         /*
00349          * Body for "habeo corpus" operations.
00350          */
00351         const struct mdt_body     *mti_body;
00352         /*
00353          * Host object. This is released at the end of mdt_handler().
00354          */
00355         struct mdt_object         *mti_object;
00356         /*
00357          * Lock request for "habeo clavis" operations.
00358          */
00359         const struct ldlm_request *mti_dlm_req;
00360 
00361         __u32                      mti_has_trans:1, /* has txn already? */
00362                                    mti_cross_ref:1;
00363 
00364         /* opdata for mdt_reint_open(), has the same as
00365          * ldlm_reply:lock_policy_res1.  mdt_update_last_rcvd() stores this
00366          * value onto disk for recovery when mdt_trans_stop_cb() is called.
00367          */
00368         __u64                      mti_opdata;
00369 
00370         /*
00371          * XXX: Part Three:
00372          * The following members will be filled explicitly
00373          * with zero in mdt_reint_unpack(), because they are only used
00374          * by reint requests (including mdt_reint_open()).
00375          */
00376 
00377         /*
00378          * reint record. contains information for reint operations.
00379          */
00380         struct mdt_reint_record    mti_rr;
00381 
00382         __u64                      mti_ver[PTLRPC_NUM_VERSIONS];
00383         /*
00384          * Operation specification (currently create and lookup)
00385          */
00386         struct md_op_spec          mti_spec;
00387 
00388         /*
00389          * XXX: Part Four:
00390          * The following members will _NOT_ be initialized at all.
00391          * DO NOT expect them to contain any valid value.
00392          * They should be initialized explicitly by the user themselves.
00393          */
00394 
00395         /* XXX: If something is in a union, make sure they do not conflict */
00396         struct lu_fid                   mti_tmp_fid1;
00397         struct lu_fid                   mti_tmp_fid2;
00398         union ldlm_policy_data          mti_policy; /* for mdt_object_lock() */
00399         struct ldlm_res_id              mti_res_id; /* and mdt_rename_lock() */
00400         union {
00401                 struct obd_uuid         uuid[2];    /* for mdt_seq_init_cli() */
00402                 char                    ns_name[48];/* for mdt_init0()        */
00403                 struct lustre_cfg_bufs  bufs;       /* for mdt_stack_fini()   */
00404                 struct obd_statfs       osfs;       /* for mdt_statfs()       */
00405                 struct {
00406                         /* for mdt_readpage()      */
00407                         struct lu_rdpg     mti_rdpg;
00408                         /* for mdt_sendpage()      */
00409                         struct l_wait_info mti_wait_info;
00410                 } rdpg;
00411                 struct {
00412                         struct md_attr attr;
00413                 } hsm;
00414         } mti_u;
00415 
00416         struct lustre_handle       mti_close_handle;
00417         loff_t                     mti_off;
00418         struct lu_buf              mti_buf;
00419         struct lu_buf              mti_big_buf;
00420 
00421         /* Ops object filename */
00422         struct lu_name             mti_name;
00423         /* per-thread values, can be re-used, may be vmalloc'd */
00424         void                      *mti_big_lmm;
00425         int                        mti_big_lmmsize;
00426         /* big_lmm buffer was used and must be used in reply */
00427         int                        mti_big_lmm_used;
00428         /* should be enough to fit lustre_mdt_attrs */
00429         char                       mti_xattr_buf[128];
00430         struct ldlm_enqueue_info   mti_einfo;
00431         struct tg_reply_data      *mti_reply_data;
00432 };
00433 
00434 extern struct lu_context_key mdt_thread_key;
00435 
00436 static inline struct mdt_thread_info *mdt_th_info(const struct lu_env *env)
00437 {
00438         struct mdt_thread_info *mti;
00439 
00440         lu_env_refill((void *)env);
00441         mti = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &mdt_thread_key);
00442         LASSERT(mti);
00443         return mti;
00444 }
00445 
00446 struct cdt_req_progress {
00447         struct mutex             crp_lock;      
00448         struct interval_node    *crp_root;      
00450         struct interval_node    **crp_node;     
00453         int                      crp_cnt;       
00454         int                      crp_max;       
00455 };
00456 
00457 struct cdt_agent_req {
00458         struct list_head         car_request_list; 
00459         atomic_t                 car_refcount;     
00460         __u64                    car_compound_id;  
00461         __u64                    car_flags;        
00462         struct obd_uuid          car_uuid;         
00463         __u32                    car_archive_id;   
00464         int                      car_canceled;     
00465         cfs_time_t               car_req_start;    
00466         cfs_time_t               car_req_update;   
00467         struct hsm_action_item  *car_hai;          
00468         struct cdt_req_progress  car_progress;     
00470 };
00471 extern struct kmem_cache *mdt_hsm_car_kmem;
00472 
00473 struct hsm_agent {
00474         struct list_head ha_list;               
00475         struct obd_uuid  ha_uuid;               
00476         __u32           *ha_archive_id;         
00477         int              ha_archive_cnt;        
00479         atomic_t         ha_requests;           
00480         atomic_t         ha_success;            
00482         atomic_t         ha_failure;            
00483 };
00484 
00485 struct cdt_restore_handle {
00486         struct list_head        crh_list;       
00487         struct lu_fid           crh_fid;        
00488         struct ldlm_extent      crh_extent;     
00489         struct mdt_lock_handle  crh_lh;         
00490 };
00491 extern struct kmem_cache *mdt_hsm_cdt_kmem;     
00493 static inline const struct md_device_operations *
00494 mdt_child_ops(struct mdt_device * m)
00495 {
00496         LASSERT(m->mdt_child);
00497         return m->mdt_child->md_ops;
00498 }
00499 
00500 static inline struct md_object *mdt_object_child(struct mdt_object *o)
00501 {
00502         LASSERT(o);
00503         return lu2md(lu_object_next(&o->mot_obj));
00504 }
00505 
00506 static inline struct ptlrpc_request *mdt_info_req(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00507 {
00508          return info->mti_pill ? info->mti_pill->rc_req : NULL;
00509 }
00510 
00511 static inline __u64 mdt_conn_flags(struct mdt_thread_info *info)
00512 {
00513         LASSERT(info->mti_exp);
00514         return exp_connect_flags(info->mti_exp);
00515 }
00516 
00517 static inline void mdt_object_get(const struct lu_env *env,
00518                                   struct mdt_object *o)
00519 {
00520         ENTRY;
00521         lu_object_get(&o->mot_obj);
00522         EXIT;
00523 }
00524 
00525 static inline void mdt_object_put(const struct lu_env *env,
00526                                   struct mdt_object *o)
00527 {
00528         ENTRY;
00529         lu_object_put(env, &o->mot_obj);
00530         EXIT;
00531 }
00532 
00533 static inline int mdt_object_exists(const struct mdt_object *o)
00534 {
00535         return lu_object_exists(&o->mot_obj);
00536 }
00537 
00538 static inline int mdt_object_remote(const struct mdt_object *o)
00539 {
00540         return lu_object_remote(&o->mot_obj);
00541 }
00542 
00543 static inline const struct lu_fid *mdt_object_fid(const struct mdt_object *o)
00544 {
00545         return lu_object_fid(&o->mot_obj);
00546 }
00547 
00548 static inline struct lu_site *mdt_lu_site(const struct mdt_device *mdt)
00549 {
00550         return mdt->mdt_lu_dev.ld_site;
00551 }
00552 
00553 static inline struct seq_server_site *mdt_seq_site(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00554 {
00555         return &mdt->mdt_seq_site;
00556 }
00557 
00558 static inline void mdt_export_evict(struct obd_export *exp)
00559 {
00560         class_fail_export(exp);
00561 }
00562 
00563 /* Here we use LVB_TYPE to check dne client, because it is
00564  * also landed on 2.4. */
00565 static inline bool mdt_is_dne_client(struct obd_export *exp)
00566 {
00567         return !!(exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_LVB_TYPE);
00568 }
00569 
00570 static inline bool mdt_is_striped_client(struct obd_export *exp)
00571 {
00572         return exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_DIR_STRIPE;
00573 }

00609 struct mdt_object *mdt_object_new(const struct lu_env *env,
00610                                   struct mdt_device *,

00613                                    struct mdt_device *,

00750 static inline struct mdt_device *mdt_dev(struct lu_device *d)
00751 {
00752         return container_of0(d, struct mdt_device, mdt_lu_dev);
00753 }

00756 {
00757         return container_of0(o, struct mdt_object, mot_obj);
00758 }
00759 
00760 static inline struct dt_object *mdt_obj2dt(struct mdt_object *mo)
00761 {
00762         struct lu_object        *lo;
00763         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mdt_dev(mo->mot_obj.lo_dev);
00764 
00765         lo = lu_object_locate(mo->mot_obj.lo_header,
00766                               mdt->mdt_bottom->dd_lu_dev.ld_type);
00767 
00768         return lu2dt(lo);
00769 }

00895 /* debug issues helper starts here*/
00896 static inline int mdt_fail_write(const struct lu_env *env,
00897                                  struct dt_device *dd, int id)
00898 {
00899         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK_ORSET(id, OBD_FAIL_ONCE)) {
00900                 CERROR(LUSTRE_MDT_NAME": cfs_fail_loc=%x, fail write ops\n",
00901                        id);
00902                 return dd->dd_ops->dt_ro(env, dd);
00903                 /* We set FAIL_ONCE because we never "un-fail" a device */
00904         }
00905 
00906         return 0;
00907 }

00912 }

00917 }
00918 
00919 typedef void (*mdt_reconstruct_t)(struct mdt_thread_info *mti,
00920                                   struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc);
00921 static inline int mdt_check_resent(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00922                                    mdt_reconstruct_t reconstruct,
00923                                    struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
00924 {
00925         struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00926         int rc = 0;
00927         ENTRY;
00928 
00929         if (lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_RESENT) {
00930                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(info->mti_reply_data);
00931                 if (info->mti_reply_data == NULL)
00932                         RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00933 
00934                 if (req_can_reconstruct(req, info->mti_reply_data)) {
00935                         reconstruct(info, lhc);
00936                         rc = 1;
00937                 } else {
00938                         DEBUG_REQ(D_HA, req,
00939                                   "no reply data found for RESENT req");
00940                         rc = 0;
00941                 }
00942                 OBD_FREE_PTR(info->mti_reply_data);
00943                 info->mti_reply_data = NULL;
00944         }
00945         RETURN(rc);
00946 }

00951 static inline int is_identity_get_disabled(struct upcall_cache *cache)
00952 {
00953         return cache ? (strcmp(cache->uc_upcall, "NONE") == 0) : 1;
00954 }
00955 
00956 int mdt_blocking_ast(struct ldlm_lock*, struct ldlm_lock_desc*, void*, int);
00957 
00958 /* Issues dlm lock on passed @ns, @f stores it lock handle into @lh. */
00959 static inline int mdt_fid_lock(struct ldlm_namespace *ns,
00960                                struct lustre_handle *lh, enum ldlm_mode mode,
00961                                union ldlm_policy_data *policy,
00962                                const struct ldlm_res_id *res_id,
00963                                __u64 flags, const __u64 *client_cookie)
00964 {
00965         int rc;
00966 
00967         LASSERT(ns != NULL);
00968         LASSERT(lh != NULL);
00969 
00970         rc = ldlm_cli_enqueue_local(ns, res_id, LDLM_IBITS, policy,
00971                                     mode, &flags, mdt_blocking_ast,
00972                                     ldlm_completion_ast, NULL, NULL, 0,
00973                                     LVB_T_NONE, client_cookie, lh);
00974         return rc == ELDLM_OK ? 0 : -EIO;
00975 }
00976 
00977 static inline void mdt_fid_unlock(struct lustre_handle *lh, enum ldlm_mode mode)
00978 {
00979         ldlm_lock_decref(lh, mode);
00980 }
00981 
00982 static inline bool mdt_slc_is_enabled(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00983 {
00984         return mdt->mdt_lut.lut_sync_lock_cancel == BLOCKING_SYNC_ON_CANCEL;
00985 }

00990 static inline mdl_mode_t mdt_dlm_mode2mdl_mode(enum ldlm_mode mode)
00991 {
00992         LASSERT(IS_PO2(mode));
00993         return mdt_mdl_lock_modes[mode];
00994 }
00995 
00996 static inline enum ldlm_mode mdt_mdl_mode2dlm_mode(mdl_mode_t mode)
00997 {
00998         LASSERT(IS_PO2(mode));
00999         return mdt_dlm_lock_modes[mode];
01000 }

01056 static inline char *mdt_req_get_jobid(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
01057 {
01058         struct obd_export       *exp = req->rq_export;
01059         char                    *jobid = NULL;
01060 
01061         if (exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_JOBSTATS)
01062                 jobid = lustre_msg_get_jobid(req->rq_reqmsg);
01063 
01064         return jobid;
01065 }
